trans-unit.source: Represents the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la riga del pager in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the DetailsViewPagerRow is created to hold the pager controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Viene creata un'istanza del DetailsViewPagerRow per contenere i controlli pager in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface is a marker that indicates that the DetailsViewPagerRow control is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>interfaccia Ã¨ un indicatore che indica che il controllo DetailsViewPagerRow fa parte di <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>gerarchia dei controlli dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe viene usata principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli.

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> class to create a custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di controlli possono eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>costruttore e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A>metodi del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>classe per creare una riga del pager personalizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The DetailsViewPagerRow constructor calls the base class constructor, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore DetailsViewPagerRow chiama il costruttore della classe base, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, con i parametri specificati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the call is made with `rowIndex` equal to -1, `rowType` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>, and `rowState` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.
trans-unit.target: Per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow>controllo un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>(controllo), con cui viene effettuata la chiamata `rowIndex` uguale a -1, `rowType` uguale a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>, e `rowState` uguale a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
